verses.verse: <S%G5620>Therefore<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> dearly <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> longed <S%G1973>for<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4735>crown<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> stand <S%G4739>fast<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, my dearly <S%G27>beloved<s%>.
I <S%G3870>beg<s%> <S%G2136>Euodias<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>beg<s%> <S%G846>Syntyche<s%>, that <S%G5426>they<s%> be of the same mind <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G2065>entreat<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G1103>true<s%> <S%G4805>yokefellow<s%>, <S%G4815>help<s%> those <S%G846>women<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G4866>labored<s%> with <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>, <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2815>Clement<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> with <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4904>fellow-workers<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> are <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>.

Be <S%G3309>anxious<s%> for <S%G3367>nothing<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> every <S%G3956>thing<s%> by <S%G4335>prayer<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1162>supplication<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%> <S%G1107>let<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G155>requests<s%> be made <S%G1107>known<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G3063>Finally<s%>, <S%G80>brothers<s%>, whatever <S%G3745>things<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G227>true<s%>, whatever <S%G3745>things<s%> are <S%G4586>honest<s%>, whatever <S%G3745>things<s%> are <S%G1342>just<s%>, whatever <S%G3745>things<s%> are <S%G53>pure<s%>, whatever <S%G3745>things<s%> are <S%G4375>lovely<s%>, whatever <S%G3745>things<s%> are of good <S%G2163>report<s%>; <S%G1487>if<s%> there be <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G703>virtue<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there be <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%>, think <S%G3049>on<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3171>greatly<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> at the <S%G4218>last<s%> your <S%G5426>care<s%> <S%G5228>of<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> has <S%G330>flourished<s%> <S%G3739>again<s%>; where <S%G1909>in<s%> you <S%G5426>were<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5426>careful<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> you lacked <S%G170>opportunity<s%>.

<S%G3756>Not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G3004>speak<s%> in respect <S%G2596>of<s%> <S%G5304>want<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G3129>learned<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>whatever<s%> state I <S%G1510>am<s%>, with it to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G842>content<s%>.

I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G1492>how<s%> to be <S%G5013>abased<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I know <S%G1492>how<s%> to <S%G1722>abound<s%>: every <S%G3956>where<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> I am <S%G3453>instructed<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to be <S%G5526>full<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to be <S%G3983>hungry<s%>, <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G4052>abound<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to suffer <S%G5302>need<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G568>have<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4052>abound<s%>: I am <S%G4137>full<s%>, having <S%G1209>received<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G1891>Epaphroditus<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> which were sent <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, a <S%G3744>odor<s%> of a sweet <S%G2175>smell<s%>, a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> <S%G1184>acceptable<s%>, <S%G2101>wellpleasing<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>.

The <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2962>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>. <S%G1891>Amen<s%>. It was written to the Philippians from Rome by Epaphroditus.
